extendedInfo.description: NO IN-APP PURCHASES. FULL GAME IS FREE!The follow up to the hit puzzle action game Tank Hero has finally arrived! Charge your lasers and get ready to take the fight to new battlegrounds that will challenge you like never before. Equip your tank with ray guns, plasma howitzers, sonic cannons, and more. Use the all new interactive environments to strategically take our your enemies.Challenge your friends in split screen DEATHMATCH mode for tablets!FEATURES * All new 3D graphics engine with hyper realistic lighting and special effects * Three unique worlds to conquer * Interactive environments that include force fields, exploding barrels, and more * Super charge your tank on the battlefield with powerups such as energy shields and speed boost * Epic boss battles that will put your skills to the ultimate test* Split screen deathmatch mode* All new achievements system * 4 difficulty levels to accomodate all types of players * Original soundtrack The game is 20 MB. No additional download necessary!Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/clapfoot Join us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/pages/Tank-Hero/222464784431571

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Smooth & varied gameplay, great graphics, best played on tablets
reviews.author: Stephen Sullivan

reviews.title: Coool :)
reviews.comment: This game is fun and addicting all though some are hard its cool what they\'ve done to the game.
reviews.author: Natha Stewart

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This game kills so much time while I\'m in class haha, and the multiplayer is even better please add more levels! Thanks

reviews.title: Alex O\'Day
reviews.comment: Awsome game 5 star!!! Good graphics,cool level and flipping good levels

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: thats a very cool and addictable game ever i played...in this game i liked the laser most...excellent game..wow
reviews.author: Pranav Jadhav

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is one heck of a game. Though it might seem simplistic it is in fact an extremely fast paced action shooter. Graphics and game play are very good for this kind of game. Controls are a little tough to get used too though. Great work developers! :))
reviews.author: Wilhelm Drago Eifler

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: This game is pretty good......poor placement for control but good game
reviews.author: Bryce Lambert

reviews.title: good fun
reviews.comment: Graphics are great.  Good looking and smooth game.
reviews.author: Matthew Dauner

reviews.title: Better than the original.
reviews.comment: This is an excellent game and moving through the levels is very smooth and fun.

reviews.title: Superb exabulbulous ans out standing
reviews.comment: This is awesome and awesome, blossom, THE BEST GAME EVER!!

reviews.title: OMG
reviews.comment: In my one year of entering google play, this is one of the best games I\'ve ever seen. Must be downloaded. Would have given 10 stars if possible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Really enjoyed Tank hero. This version is even better thanks to the better control response. Good job. Note2
reviews.author: Donald Gladden

reviews.title: Very fun!!!
reviews.comment: I was looking for the old school tank game from nintendo system but I found this. It\'s a great game with different challenges that keeps the player entertained. Graphic and sound A+. The space shooter is very well made too. Will look forward for developer\'s other apps.
reviews.author: sky nguyen

reviews.title: :D
reviews.comment: Its a really great 3D tank game but need more levels and upgrade tank weapons
reviews.author: Choue Fang

reviews.title: Note2
reviews.comment: Excellent game. Really entertaining. Would b better if added survival mode. That would b 6 stars
reviews.author: Fabian Carrasco

reviews.title: Very Entertaining, a brain tester too!
reviews.comment: Best tank game on Android. Decent UI & graphics, retro concept but in a Modern style. Deserves a download.
reviews.author: Karan Sheth

reviews.comment: So far this game is very good, actually one of the best games I\'ve played. The graphics are great as well can\'t complain so far\tA plus

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: This game is so cool, love the 2 player addition, now only need it so u dont need a shared screen, clap foot is one of the best game makers
